title: gold
comment: The most valuable of all metals, gold was indicative of wealth and prosperity in biblical times. It had a wide variety of uses and was employed extensively in both the tabernacle and the temple.

seealsos.comment: Wisdom cannot be bought with gold
The streets of the new Jerusalem are to be paved with gold.
Joshua sends the eastern tribes home

cschildren.title: Gold was mined from the earth
Gold was presented as offerings to God
Gold was given to rulers as tribute and bribes
The use of gold in the tabernacle
The use of gold in priestly vestments
The use of gold in the temple

seealsos.comment: used to make the golden calf

cschildren.title: Metaphorical and proverbial use of gold
